150 Years of ACS
150 Years of ACS Get Involved Events

Mark Your Calendar for ACS' 150th Anniversary

2026

In 2026, were celebrating 150 years of breakthroughs, connections, and real-world solutions that make life better. Chemistry shapes everything around us, and were taking that message across the country and around the world.
Be part of the movement!

MEETING & CONFERENCES

The ACS community will be organizing events across the United States and around the world beginning in late 2025.
ENGAGING TALKS & PANELS

Well be bringing together the community to discuss chemistry, leadership, and the impact of science on the next 150 years.
INSPIRING VIDEOS

Behind every chemical reaction is story. Stay tuned for new media celebrating the history of our discipline and the people who catalyze it.
SPECIAL EVENTS & MORE!

With milestone celebrations and immersive experiences, well have all the elements of a celebration 150 years in the making.

Events

More Events
Pacifichem 2025: Honululu Hawaii December 15 - 20, 2025 Green Chemistry Conferences November 9 - 10, 2025 ACS Spring Meeting March 23 - 26, 2026
